content:
I was trying to do some issue triage (unrelated to traits WG) and then noticed that I (or the GitHub team) lost write permission to the rust repo.

I'm sorry that I haven't participated for a while, but is this change intended?

@Tatsuyuki Ishi https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/131828-t-compiler/topic/codeowners
I lost it too, the team seems trying to introduce a new permission strategy in the org.
@Tatsuyuki Ishi @csmoe sorry, that's my fault, I can restore it

I wasn't really aiming to take write access away from anyone, but I changed some of the larger aliases that had previously had write access to be read-only, with the intention of promoting active folks back to write access
it's a bit tricky to know how to structure GH teams :(
anyway, I added both of you back to a team called rust-push, which is for folks can tag issues
let me know if that works for you :)
